name: Wyvern
description: A dragon-like creature with a poisonous tail stinger and large wings.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.description: Wyvern slashes with sharp claws, dealing 1d8 damage.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Wyvern bites its target, dealing 1d10 damage.

attacks.name: Tail Stinger
attacks.description: Wyvern strikes with a poisonous tail, dealing 1d6 damage plus poison.
